'''Grainfruit Chips''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Grainfruit Chips is obtainable from [[Cipac]] at the [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Grainfruit Chips restores '''18'''/'''20'''/'''22'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''300'''/'''390'''/'''470''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Kachina|Impeccably Organized}}
